para.dtcname: Short in Turn Signal / Hazard Flasher Circuit

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: Open in turn signal light circuit.

item.ptxt: Side turn signal light socket and wire
Rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Short in Turn Signal / Hazard Flasher Circuit

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: Short in turn signal light circuit or hazard warning light circuit.

item.ptxt: Side turn signal light socket and wire
Rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly

atten3.ptxt: Inspect the bulbs for circuits related to this system before performing the following procedure.

test1.ptxt: Clear the DTCs.
Click here

gts-info.title: Body Electrical > Combination Meter > Clear DTCs

test1.ptxt: Recheck for DTCs and check that no DTCs are output.
Click here

gts-info.title: Body Electrical > Combination Meter > Trouble Codes

entry.ptxt: B1507 and B1508 are not output

action.actiontitle: USE SIMULATION METHOD TO CHECK

test1.ptxt: Check the illumination of each turn signal light.

entry.ptxt: LH side turn signal light does not illuminate.
RH side turn signal light does not illuminate.

testgrp.testtitle: CHECK HARNESS AND CONNECTOR (LH SIDE CIRCUIT)

test1.ptxt: Disconnect the L50 combination meter assembly connector.
Disconnect the A3 front turn signal light socket LH connector.
Disconnect the A11 side turn signal light socket and wire LH connector.
Disconnect the T7*1 or T5*1, or T17*2 rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH connector.
Measure the resistance according to the value(s) in the table below.

action.actiontitle: REPAIR OR REPLACE HARNESS OR CONNECTOR

testgrp.testtitle: INSPECT FRONT TURN SIGNAL LIGHT SOCKET LH

test1.ptxt: Remove the front turn signal light socket LH.
Click here
Apply battery voltage to the connector and check the light illumination condition.

action.actiontitle: REPLACE FRONT TURN SIGNAL LIGHT SOCKET LH

testgrp.testtitle: INSPECT SIDE TURN SIGNAL LIGHT SOCKET AND WIRE LH

test1.ptxt: Remove the side turn signal light socket and wire LH.
Click here
Apply battery voltage to the connector and check the light illumination condition.

action.actiontitle: REPLACE SIDE TURN SIGNAL LIGHT SOCKET AND WIRE LH

testgrp.testtitle: INSPECT REAR COMBINATION LIGHT SOCKET AND WIRE SUB-ASSEMBLY LH

test1.ptxt: Remove the rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH.
for Canvas Top: Click here
for Pickup: Click here
for Van: Click here
Apply battery voltage to the connector and check the light illumination condition.

action.actiontitle: REPLACE COMBINATION METER ASSEMBLY
REPLACE REAR COMBINATION LIGHT SOCKET AND WIRE SUB-ASSEMBLY LH

testgrp.testtitle: CHECK HARNESS AND CONNECTOR (RH SIDE CIRCUIT)

test1.ptxt: Disconnect the L50 combination meter assembly connector.
Disconnect the I38 front turn signal light socket RH connector.
Disconnect the I25 side turn signal light socket and wire RH connector.
Disconnect the T6*1 or T1*1, or T14*2 rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly RH connector.
Measure the resistance according to the value(s) in the table below.

action.actiontitle: REPAIR OR REPLACE HARNESS OR CONNECTOR

testgrp.testtitle: INSPECT FRONT TURN SIGNAL LIGHT SOCKET RH

test1.ptxt: Remove the front turn signal light socket RH.
Click here
Apply battery voltage to the connector and check the light illumination condition.

action.actiontitle: REPLACE FRONT TURN SIGNAL LIGHT SOCKET RH

testgrp.testtitle: INSPECT SIDE TURN SIGNAL LIGHT SOCKET AND WIRE RH

test1.ptxt: Remove the side turn signal light socket and wire RH.
Click here
Apply battery voltage to the connector and check the light illumination condition.

action.actiontitle: REPLACE SIDE TURN SIGNAL LIGHT SOCKET AND WIRE RH

testgrp.testtitle: INSPECT REAR COMBINATION LIGHT SOCKET AND WIRE SUB-ASSEMBLY RH

test1.ptxt: Remove the rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly RH.
for Canvas Top: Click here
for Pickup: Click here
for Van: Click here
Apply battery voltage to the connector and check the light illumination condition.

action.actiontitle: REPLACE COMBINATION METER ASSEMBLY
REPLACE REAR COMBINATION LIGHT SOCKET AND WIRE SUB-ASSEMBLY RH

test1.ptxt: Check the illumination of each turn signal light.

entry.ptxt: LH side turn signal light does not illuminate.
RH side turn signal light does not illuminate.

testgrp.testtitle: CHECK HARNESS AND CONNECTOR (LH SIDE CIRCUIT)

test1.ptxt: Disconnect the L50 combination meter assembly connector.
Disconnect the A3 front turn signal light socket LH connector.
Disconnect the A11 side turn signal light socket and wire LH connector.
Disconnect the T7*1 or T5*1, or T17*2 rear combination light socket and wire sub-assembly LH connector.
Measure the resistance according to the value(s) in the table below.

action.actiontitle: REPAIR OR REPLACE HARNESS OR CONNECTOR

testgrp.testtitle: CHECK HARNESS AND CONNECTOR (FRONT TURN SIGNAL LIGHT CIRCUIT)

test1.ptxt: Disconnect the A3 front turn signal light socket LH connector.
Clear the DTCs.
Click here

gts-info.title: Body Electrical > Combination Meter > Clear DTCs

test1.ptxt: Turn on the turn signal light LH and check that DTCs are output.
Click here

gts-info.title: Body Electrical > Combination Meter > Trouble Codes

action.actiontitle: REPLACE FRONT TURN SIGNAL LIGHT SOCKET LH

testgrp.testtitle: CHECK HARNESS AND CONNECTOR (SIDE TURN SIGNAL LIGHT CIRCUIT)

gts-info.title: Body Electrical > Combination Meter > Trouble Codes

action.actiontitle: REPLACE SIDE TURN SIGNAL LIGHT SOCKET AND WIRE LH

gts-info.title: Body Electrical > Combination Meter > Trouble Codes

action.actiontitle: REPLACE COMBINATION METER ASSEMBLY
REPLACE REAR COMBINATION LIGHT SOCKET AND WIRE SUB-ASSEMBLY LH
